author: Luke Kerr-Dineen
title: 30 3-word sports stories that are guaranteed to break your heart | For The Win
text:
30 3-word sports stories that are guaranteed to break your heart 30 3-word sports stories that are guaranteed to break your heart By Luke Kerr-Dineen February 21, 2017 1:32 pm Follow @LukeKerrDineen 321 shares Follow @LukeKerrDineen 
A fun challenge swept around the internet on Tuesday. It involved this picture… 
The cynics we are over here at For The Win , that immediately set our minds to some of the saddest three-word sports stories we could think of. Here they are, with some help from the good people on Twitter. 
Enjoy…
